name: Bengali Cultural Association of Arizona (BCAA)
description: This organization aims to celebrate and promote Bengali culture in the greater Phoenix area. They offer opportunities for children to learn the Bengali language and culture. Contact information can be found on their website
services: Bengali-speaking Childrens activities in Arizona consultation

name: AmazingTalker
description: This platform offers online Bengali tutors for children, with options for one-on-one classes. They have tutors available in Arizona

name: Language Trainers
description: Offers in-person and online Bengali classes in Phoenix and Tucson, including options for children

name: Samhita
description: A non-profit socio-cultural organization for South Asians in Phoenix, AZ, that organizes cultural and fun activities for children to appreciate their heritage
services: Bengali-speaking Childrens activities in Arizona consultation

name: Phoenix Indian Center
description: While focused on Native American culture, they offer programs for children and families and may have resources or connections to other cultural groups. They provide services from workforce development to cultural programs

name: Art Gharana LLC
description: Offers online music, dance, vocal, and art & craft classes for all ages, including children. Instruction is available in multiple languages, including Bengali

name: KDC Performing Arts
description: Offers classes in various Indian dance forms, including Bollywood, Bharatanatyam, and Kuchipudi, for all skill levels, including children. They have locations in Chandler, Mesa, Phoenix, and Peoria

name: Bengali Association of Southern Arizona
